text: Tyrus Raymond "Ty" Cobb (December 18, 1886 â€“ July 17, 1961), also known as "The Georgia Peach," was a Major League Baseball player. He is known as the best player of the dead-ball era (before 1920) and as one of the best baseball players of all time. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Official site * Ty Cobb Museum Category:1886 births Category:1961 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Detroit Tigers managers Category:Detroit Tigers players
title: Ty Cobb
